subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana single-handedly kept the Mets’ season alive with a stellar performance Saturday. The Mets are tied with the Brewers, who lost to the Cubs, in the wild card race.
snippet: Johan Santana single-handedly kept the Mets’ season alive with a stellar performance Saturday. The Mets are tied with the Brewers, who lost to the Cubs, in the wild card race.
